text.text_translated: Erik Weihenmayer is from the United States. He likes adventure. He rode a bike in the deserts of Morocco. He kayaked in the Grand Canyon. He also climbed Everest. He cannot see. He was 13 when this happened. He also helps people to live active lives. He leads groups of young people who cannot see on climbing trips.
